name: eSakai (Pre-Alpha)
description:
==CONTROLS==

Visual Novel ::

  • ESC Skip Scene
  • Spacebar Proceed to next dialogue
  • Hold Spacebar Fast forward dialogue text
  • Left Click For dialogue choices

Rideshare ::

  • Click & Drag Rideshare Volume Knob (Left to Right)
  • Left Click    Other settings

Air Hockey ::

  • W,A,S,D Move Paddle
  • Left Click Launch Puck

Shooting Game ::

  • Move Mouse Aim
  • Left Click Shoot
  • R Reload

Rhythm Game ::

  • Keyboard Press alphabet keys as needed (A,S,D,J,K,L)
